name: Blobbgers
description:
AD/arrows- to move left and right

Space/W- to jump

You are at your wedding about to marry the love of your life, but then you realize that the evil orange blobbgers have stolen your ring and are keeping it at a top secret base (Definetly not a normal house). it is your job to get the ring, but watch out for the blobbgers, their skin is poisonous and if you touch it you will "go to sleep." good luck on your journey
